apps.name: Streamer iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
**Ultimate Streaming Experience for iOS, tvOS and macOS**

- **Ad-Free Streaming**: Enjoy uninterrupted streaming of your favorite TV shows and movies from a variety of websites.
- **Chromecast Support**: Easily cast content to your FireTV or Chromecast devices for a seamless viewing experience.
- **Multi-Language Subtitles**: Accessible international viewing with subtitles available in multiple languages.
- **Favorites**: Quickly navigate to your beloved shows and films with our convenient favorites feature.
- **Trakt Integration**: Keep an eye on your viewing habits and never lose track of your watched content with Trakt.
- **Debrid Compatibility**: Enhanced streaming with support for Real-Debrid, AllDebrid, Premiumize, Offcloud, DebridLink, and EasyNews.
- **Player Integrations**: Choose your preferred playback experience with compatibility for VLC, Infuse, and iina players.
- **Stremio Addons**: Expand your library and discover more content with Stremio addon integration.

versions.localizedDescription: - Integrated Stremio catalogs for movies, series, and anime browsing. More info and tutorial here https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/blob/main/streamio_addons.md - Added "mark all as watched" for the current season's episodes. - Included Subdl support for subtitle search. - Fixed touch response issue in Apple player. - Integrated Outplayer and Vidplayer for iOS. - Made downloaded files accessible in the Files app for iOS. - Added option in Advanced settings to enable/disable secure DNS with "cloudflare" or "google" for backend connectivity issues. - Resolved seasons selection menu issue on Mac.

apps.subtitle: Streamer App for Streaming Movies and TV shows on iOS, tvOS and Mac
